pull.title: Switch CCoinsMap from boost to std unordered_map
pull.body: Rely less on Boost. There is no pressing reason for this now, but it'd be nice to have it for #10195.

events.message: Add support for std::unordered_{map,set} to memusage.h
Switch CCoinsMap from boost to std unordered_map

events.body:
utACK e6756ad
~~Will the first commit pass individually? If not, maybe better squash.~~
@jtimon I haven't tried but I don't see why not. It just adds some things to memusage...

> die boost.

I always interpret such statements as German.
